short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Effortlessly record your test cases and save them directly on the MuukTest platform

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
With this extension, you'll accelerate the creation of high-quality tests, and discover more bugs. Plus, you can seamlessly automate them in Selenium or Playwright with minimal additional effort – making you up to 20 times faster and happier!

Why Choose MuukTest?
Move fast and uncover bugs without disrupting your Web, Mobile, and API apps, thanks to MuukTest’s effortless test automation solution.

We design, manage, and maintain end-to-end tests on the MuukTest platform — getting you up to 95% test coverage within 3 months.

Explore more about Muuktest Test Automation Services here: https://muuktest.com/

- Test Automation Platform: https://muuktest.com/automation-testing-platform/ 
- QA Testing Services: https://muuktest.com/qa-testing-services/
